item.title: New Jersey Sen. Cory Booker launches overnight speech to protest Trump's agenda
item.description: New Jersey Democratic Sen. Cory Booker carried an all-night speech in protest of President Trump's agenda into Tuesday morning.

item.title: Maine gets 'final warning' after defying Trump's ban on biological males in girls' sports

item.title: Trump says dozens have said they want U.N. ambassador role
